_sText:
INTRODUCTION
 Finally. Finally the day came, when I released a map on FPSBanana. Since in my opinion Counter-Strike: Source sucks, I only play mini game and soccer maps, which is really fun for me. With a lot of mini game playing experience, we tried to make a map, which is fun and is realistic. I hope, that you all can share the fun of this map with us!
INSTALLATION
 Just put the mg_boatrace_scramble.bsp into your CS:S map folder, which is located at: ?:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\*STEAM NAME*\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\ or similar folder structures.
ABOUT THE MAP
 The goal of the map is to win the boatrace. Since there are only 6 boats to drive with, we built a bar and a bowling lane for you. But if you don't watch out, you will wake up in hospital. Boat controls: W,A,S,D - Steering MOUSE2 - Motor shutdown
LAST NOTES
 If you find any bug, feel free to contact us. If you like this map, please rate it with 10/10 and add it to favorites. Oh, and please upload it to your servers! Thanks!
